sourcesContent:
import React from 'react'; import styles from './Business.css'; function Business () { const business = { imageSrc: 'https://content.codecademy.com/programs/react/ravenous/pizza.jpg', name: 'MarginOtto Pizzeria', address: '1010 Paddington Way', city: 'Flavortown', state: 'NY', zipCode: '10101', category: 'Italian', rating: 4.5, reviewCount: 90 } return (

{business.name}

{business.address}

{business.city}

{`${business.state} ${business.zipCode}`}

{business.category}

{`${business.rating} stars`}

{`${business.reviewCount} reviews`}

); } export default Business;
